duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide specialized support to the Clinical Operations Team in clinical trial coordination, planning, execution, and close out.
Maintain study tracking, filing, and documentation in compliance with FDA regulations, GCP, and company standard operating policies.
Assist in the development and maintenance of study-specific documentation, guidelines, and trackers.
Manage clinical tools/trackers and assist in the preparation of presentations for study-related activities.
Collaborate with Clinical Trial Managers, Clinical Research Associates, and Contract Research Organizations to support trial monitoring activities.
Coordinate and contribute to the preparation of trial-related materials and assist in the coordination and tracking of supplies and specimen shipments.
Ensure timely completion of study tasks, triage, and coordinate resolution of clinical study issues.
Assist in quality control audits of clinical study documentation and participate in process improvement.
Conduct quality reviews of the Trial Master File and assist in reviewing data entered in data capture systems.
Copy and route incoming correspondence, internal documentation, etc., as appropriate.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS or equivalent. CCRA/CCRP certification preferred.
